title: #1: The Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
What is the Octopus of Global Control? What are the eight tentacles that are being used to shape our reality and control our lives? Who is actually in control, and why is it that they feel a need to tell us what they are planning to do to us before they actually do it? 

Tough questions to answer, but this episode starts the ball rolling towards figuring out who is involved in this centuries-long plan for world domination, why they feel an obligation to control society, how they plan of doing it, and what we can do to begin to break free from this control structure.

By the way, the audio quality gets better as the episodes go on.
